section.title: Description
section.p: This tool deletes a group. This tool is a centralized version of groupdel. It runs on OAME nodes and distributes the operation to all the specified nodes. The options applicable to groupdel are directly passed to it. For information on groupdel options, see groupdel manual.

row.entry: Continues to run the previously failed operation.
Forces to run the current operation regardless of previous failures.
Displays this help message and exits.
Specifies which host names (comma-separated) the operation is applied to. The internal IP addresses can also be used. Overrides -T.

entry.p: Specifies which node types (comma-separated) the operation is applied to.

li.p: for ME: all, auxiliary, cdr, comsvc, db, diameterapp, iohd, ioho and oame
for SM: all, auxiliary, db, ioho, oame and smapp

fig.codeblock: [root@sps-me-oame-0 ~]# /opt/tpa/sbin/delete-group -T all newGroup1 <2018.12.04 16:14:36 -0500><sps-me-oame-0><delete-group> INFO: Checking if the current operation is allowed. <2018.12.04 16:14:36 -0500><sps-me-oame-0><delete-group> INFO: Taking the operation '/usr/sbin/groupdel newGroup1' on 'all'. <2018.12.04 16:14:37 -0500><sps-me-oame-0><delete-group> INFO: The operation succeeded on all target nodes. <2018.12.04 16:14:37 -0500><sps-me-oame-0><delete-group> INFO: Done with success.
